TopicTitle: Recovering a vessel in tracking station resets player camera to the center of kerbin

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 (latest) | CPU: I9 CPU Intel | GPU: 3060 6 gb (laptop) | RAM: 16 GB

 

I recovered a craft from the surface of Kerbin, in the low mountains near the north pole and my camera reset to the middle of kerbin. Furthermore it seems like camera collision for tracking station planets  is not currently available? I can zoom in and out as much as I want into the center of the planet. This bug may also be related to other tracking station bugs in the game right now because of how all of them seem to root from how the camera is calculated in its position (it isn't a saved/constant variable).
